module.name: pm_advancedpack
module.description: Продажа пакетов товаров с учетом наличия на складе и возможность проводить бизнес-операции
module.author: Presta-Module
module.description_full: Продажа пакетов товаров с учетом наличия на складе и возможность проводить бизнес-операции.
module.additional_description: Возможность закупать дополняющие друг друга товары со скидкой или без нее одним нажатием Хотите увеличить среднюю корзину и при этом позволить своим клиентам экономить, если они приобретают несколько товаров одновременно? Теперь это возможно благодаря модулю Advanced Pack! Вы сэкономите время, сможете создать пакеты товаров, которые можно будет купить всего одним нажатием, и вам не придется беспокоиться о наличии на складе или о дополняющих товарах. Дополнительный ценный инструмент продаж Помогайте своим клиентам совершать покупки. Предлагайте им пакеты дополняющих товаров, которые вы составите заранее, так же как это делают продавцы в обычных магазинах. Например, этот замечательный фотоаппарат, карта памяти и треножник. Очевидно, что эти товары дополняют друг друга, и это заинтересует клиентов. Или можете выставлять товары, которые продаются лучше всего, вместе с теми, которые менее популярны, чтобы клиенты увидели их. В ваших пакетах может быть сколько угодно товаров, но не менее двух. Выберите количество каждого товара, а затем дополняющие товары на свой вкус. Вариантов приумножить возможности масса. Хотите отложить покупку определенного товара из пакета? Это тоже возможно! Таким образом, вы сможете предложить бесплатный товар, если он будет приобретен в составе пакета. Возможностей множество! Встроенный помощник Не всегда очевидно, какие именно товары стоит включать в пакет. И здесь опять же вам поможет модуль Advanced Pack. При создании пакета модуль будет предоставлять вам такие важные сведения, как количество проданных товаров или их наличие на складе. В ваш пакет также встроен динамический симулятор цен, который поможет лучше понять, когда стоит совершить сделку, не навредив прибыли. Станьте экспертом по дополняющим товарам Один из добавленных в пакет товаров доступен в нескольких цветах, но вы не хотите предлагать их все в одном наборе? Вам поможет модуль Advanced Pack. Вы также сможете заранее продумать дополняющие товары по умолчанию для каждого товара пакета, даже если они отличаются от указанных в вашем каталоге. Тогда ваши клиенты смогут выбрать то, что им захочется, среди параметров, которые вы включите в предложение. Бизнес-мотивация Мотивация — это то, что побуждает вашего посетителя сделать покупку. Главная задача — убедить как можно больше посетителей оформить заказ, и/или чтобы они потратили больше денег за сделку. Возможно, вы уже пробовали предлагать бесплатную доставку при определенной стоимости покупок и скидки на определенные товары или даже рассылали скидочные купоны? Все эти методы работают, но их возможности ограничены, так как эти акции временны из-за чрезмерных затрат! Хватит искать, решение уже нашлось! Для стимулирования покупок модуль Advanced Pack предоставит выбор по применению скидки, когда все товары в корзине будут заказаны, что побудит клиентов приобрести весь пакет. Доступны 3 возможности:Предложить определенную скидку на каждый товар из пакета.Применить общую скидку на набор товаров.Применить фиксированную цену, учитывая психологию покупателей например.Модуль Advanced Pack также позволяет управлять скидками, которые уже были применены к вашим товарам. Таким образом, вы сможете учесть их в цене пакета или, наоборот, вычесть, чтобы выбрать заранее заданную скидку на пакет. Принимать решения будет еще проще благодаря четкому и интуитивно понятному интерфейсу, найти товары со скидкой в котором не составит труда. Больше не придется переживать о несовпадающих ценах Приходилось ли вам когда-нибудь пересматривать все цены в каталоге, чтобы выявить и исправить возможные несовпадения? Что если бы вам пришлось вручную устранять последствия изменений в ценах товаров из пакетов? Если это не было запланировано в ваших решениях по управлению пакетами, то стало бы значительной сверхурочной нагрузкой! Напоминаем, что с помощью модуля Advanced Pack можно решить эту проблему. По умолчанию, если цена пакета не была снижена, то она складывается из цен входящих в него товаров. Как только вы измените цену товара после создания пакета, цена пакета изменится автоматически без вашего участия. В тех случаях, когда вы примените скидку на один или более товаров из существующего пакета, при условии что вы имеете права на такие рекламные изменения, цена за пакет будет также изменена, а клиенты увидят, какая была применена скидка. Товар из вашего пакета подпадает под экологический налог? Нет проблем — это будет автоматически четко указано в цене пакета в полном соответствии с законодательством. Все, что касается управления вашим складом, автоматизировано! Каждый заказанный пакет будет автоматически убран со склада, на котором хранился. Таким образом, вы избежите двойной проверки складов и проблем, связанных с несоответствием количества. Кроме того, когда товара из пакета не окажется на складе, он будет автоматически отображаться как недоступный для покупки, благодаря новейшей системе предупреждения о наличии. Для ваших клиентов мы внедрили наглядную удобную систему, которая сразу же оповещает о малом количестве дополняющих товаров или товаров, входящих в пакет. Будьте уверены: никто не закажет товары, которых нет на складе! Выделите пакеты и продайте больше После того как вы оформите пакет, вы сможете настроить его так же, как и классический товар. Можно выбрать для него любое изображение, внести его в любую категорию, оптимизировать для поиска, добавить описание, присвоить EAN-код или определенный номер, задать объем для расчета стоимости доставки и не только. Для сжатого представления и для более эффективной рекламы модуль Advanced Pack автоматически отобразит все фотографии товаров пакета, а также их табличные описания. Ваши клиенты получат нужную информацию, не покидая страницы пакета, и смогут оформить покупку одним нажатием. Но это не все... Для большей наглядности ваши пакеты будут автоматически выделяться в описаниях, если продаются партиями. Таким образом, вы побудите клиентов заказать пакет целиком вместо одного товара, который они собирались приобрести. По большому счету, это сопутствующие продажи: доступный способ увеличения средней покупательской корзины! Мы позаботились и о дизайнерах Изначально мы позаботились о том, чтобы этот модуль могли без труда приспосабливать как веб-агентства, так и дизайнеры либо специалисты по интеграции. Модуль прекрасно приспосабливается к темам по умолчанию PrestaShop 1.5 и 1.6, предоставляя при этом наиболее расширенные возможности графической настройки. В состав модуля входят набор шаблонов JavaScript и таблиц стилей CSS, которые повысят эффективность внедрения. Таким образом, вы или специалист по интеграции можете пользоваться полными возможностями движка Advanced Pack 5, чтобы графически воплотить то, что будет в лучшей мере соответствовать общему стилю вашего интернет-магазина.

Advanced Top Menu предлагает полный обзор Вашего каталога, чтобы покупателю было проще найти нужный ему товар. Благодаря его модульному построению, Вы сможете использовать строку меню для отображения картинок, действующих скидок, а также рекламы предоставляемых Вами услуг. Снабженный интерфейсом, который позволяет управлять строкой меню, не имея специальных технических знаний: ResponsiveНеограниченное количество закладокНеограниченное количество колонок Неограниченное количество ﻿элементовПолная упрощенная графическая поддержкаАвтоматическая поддержка меню из Вашего каталогаВсе типы содержания: Категории, Производители, Поставщики, CMS, Таможня...Информация отображается в зависимости от статуса пользователяNew version 1.10 A faster and cleaner configuration interface New default theme for optimal design out of the box New appearance settings New specific settings for mobile A Sticky mode, which let your menu always visible regardless of scroller position Allows you to restrict the display of some elements for desktop or mobile view Allows you to add different images for each language Opening animation effect on submenus Delay on opening submenus Contextual help tips in Back Office

module.name: amazon
module.description: Exclusive PrestaShop Addons, the Amazon Market Place module is the #1 solution to export products on Amazon, import and manage orders from the marketplace
module.author: Common-Services
module.description_full: Exclusive PrestaShop Addons, the Amazon Market Place module is the #1 solution to export products on Amazon, import and manage orders from the marketplace.
module.additional_description: You can easily integrate your PrestaShop store to the world’s top marketplace and significantly increase your sales. You import your orders into your PrestaShop store and centralize your stocks. Managing your inventory efficiently and quickly honoring your Amazon orders allows you to increase the degree of customer satisfaction and thus automatically increase the rank of your seller performance. The design of the module is based on the initial experience of online retailers. The module was developed by an online retailer for the service of his colleagues and it was developed by a team of professional developers, by making it easy to use and to have the maximum efficiency. Your purchase is protected by free technical support that is provided unconditionally until the products are placed online and the first orders are imported. This module was developed by Common-Services, which is a partner agency of Prestashop. Common-Services has been featuring on PrestaShop Addons since 2010 and it has also published 15 other best-selling modules that are marketed only on PrestaShop Addons.

module.name: pm_advancedsearch4
module.description: Выпущена новая версия лучшего многофункционального модуля навигации для PrestaShop! Мы посвятили 18 месяцев исследованиям и разработке, чтобы представить Вам более пятидесяти новых функций
module.author: Presta-Module
module.description_full: Выпущена новая версия лучшего многофункционального модуля навигации для PrestaShop! Мы посвятили 18 месяцев исследованиям и разработке, чтобы представить Вам более пятидесяти новых функций.
module.additional_description: Приложение для интернет-магазинов, которые предлагают широкий спектр товаров. Advanced Search 4 позволяет добавить любое количество поисковых систем и расположить их в любом месте страницы. Процесс поиска модуля основан на заданных фильтрах. Фильтры позволяютразнообразную и удобную навигацию. Они помогут Вашим клиентам найти продукты, которые соответствуют их критериям запроса, за минимальное количество кликов. Advanced Search 4 разрабатывался для того, чтобы исполнять запрос в кратчайшие сроки, даже для каталогов, которые содержат несколько тысяч продуктов или категорий. Первая версия опубликована в 2010 году - Победитель Best Module Awards в 2012 - Лучшие продажи по мнению Addons с 2010 года. Вы можете выбрать из 3 типов поисковых систем:Поиск по всему каталогу:Поиск по выборке продуктов: поиски ведется по странице, на которой находится пользователь.Поэтапный поиск: критерии поиска уточняются и воспроизводятся, пока пользователь формулирует свой запрос. Помимо своей основной функции, модуль Advanced Search также известен как один из лучших решений для индексирования. Он встроен в генератор страниц, оптимизированных для СЕО, что позволяет увеличить доступность, не дублируя страницы! За всеми этими новшествами, наша цель осталась прежней: помочь Вам повысить уровень конверсии и в разы вырастить Ваши продажи ! Вы поймете, что новая версия 4.11 Advanced Search дает ощутимыерезультаты!

module.name: none
module.description: 30-ДНЕВНАЯ БЕСПЛАТНАЯ ВЕРСИЯ! Решение для администраторов онлайн магазина которое Вы должны попробовать! Store Manager for PrestaShop дает возможность выполнять большинство операций по управлению инте
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: 30-ДНЕВНАЯ БЕСПЛАТНАЯ ВЕРСИЯ! Решение для администраторов онлайн магазина которое Вы должны попробовать! Store Manager for PrestaShop дает возможность выполнять большинство операций по управлению интернет магазином на базе PrestaShop в два раза быстрее, делая работу более простой и удобной. Store Manager for PrestaShop это программа для настольного компьютера или ноутбука работающего под OS Windows специально созданная для ускорения и автоматизации работы администратора онлайн магазина на базе PrestaShop. Store Manager не только делает более удобным выполнение массовых операций с продуктами, категориями, заказами и клиентами расширяя функциональность стандартной панели администрирования но также привносит новый функционал реализованый в дополнениях таких как QuickBooks Integration, Peachtree Integration, USPS Integratrion, POS, Automated Product Import и других. ﻿﻿*** ПОБЕДИТЕЛЬ В НОМИНАЦИИ “ЛУЧШИЙ МОДУЛЬ” ЦЕРЕМОНИИ PRESTASHOP AWARDS﻿ ***
module.additional_description: Экономьте время, деньги и ресурсы, позвольте Store Manager’у делать рутинную работу вместо Вас. Store Manager поможет Вашему магазину выделиться из толпы! Потратьте час, сэкономьте день! Store Manager for PrestaShop был создан чтобы работать на Вас. Это Ваш персональный ассистент который выполняет большинство рутинных задач экономя Вам время для более приятных дел. Импорт и экспорт, отчеты, дополнения - не нужно тратить дни разбираясь в деталях работы магазна, потратьте несколько часов чтобы научиться работать со Store Manager’ом. module.name: pm_seointernallinking
module.description: Improve your SEO through internal linking strategy
module.author: Presta-Module
module.description_full: Improve your SEO through internal linking strategy
module.additional_description: Enhance your PrestaShop SEO Internal linking is the creation of links between pages of your shop, using keywords you want to achieve a better place on Google. To optimize the SEO of your website, it is essential to create an internal linking that will allow search engines to browse your shop in the most easy way as possible. The goal is to provide maximum informations with the least clicks deep. SEO Internal Linking PrestaShop module optimizes the organization of navigation in your store, and plays an essential role in your SEO strategy. Define the keywords on which you wish to be listed and their landing pages, and let the module create the links for you! If you want to add automatic links in your categories descriptions, consider installing our PrestaShop module HTML On Descriptions. Do we really need internal linking? Internal linking strategy based on specific keywords is an optimization method that has proven its worth. Especially to enhance a content relevance. Among the disadvantages, you should know that the installation of these links is long and tedious, and requires to follow SEO good practices, to not over-optimize (which would be detected by Google), and must be updated regularly to track changes in your catalog. With this in mind, we have developed this module, allowing you to deploy thousands of cross links between your pages within minutes, while being sure to observe best practice guidelines of White Hat SEO. It has been designed to support both SEO agencies and e-shop owners. SEO Internal Linking is really simple to manage.

module.name: groupinc
module.displayName: Price Increment/Reduction by group, category and more
module.description: With our module you can set the product prices to your customers which do you want to really have
module.author: Idnovate
module.description_full: With our module you can set the product prices to your customers which do you want to really have. Increments, reductions (discounts) and massive fixed price changes with an unlimited conditions and combinations to modify your product prices.
module.additional_description: Change the product prices massivelyYou can change the price of the products massively, setting an increment, a discount or a fixed price using these conditions:- Category- Product- Customer group- Customer- Country- Zone- Supplier- Manufacturer- Language- Currency If you choose the percentage type, it can be calculated from Retail or Wholesale price and with or without taxes.To apply the rule, you have this additional controls: - Minimum threshold price- Maximum threshold price- Date From- Date To And also, you can control the final price result setting a minimum and a maximum price with: - Minimum result price- Maximum result price The module adds a priority system in case that two or more rules must be applied to the same product. In this case, you can establish a priority to set the order and if you want to only execute one of this rules (using the option:"Apply only one condition"). Discounts managementTo apply and manage the discounts with our module, you have 3 options: - Show reduction as discount: With this option enabled, the reduction is showed like discount (specific price), then the price of the product will show the old price and the new price with the discount amount/percentage.* Only works if the rule configuration create with our module is a discount. - Skip other discounts: If the product has a previous discount, the rule will not be applied to this product.- Override discounts: If the product has a previous discount, the rule will be applied and the previous discount will be overrided (ommitted but not deleted).This 2 options, are applicable with any of the configurations that you can do with our module. ★ ¡New! ★ -> Change the prices within a period (date from and date to)Configure the price changes (increment, discount or fixed price) between 2 dates, or from a date or until a date. It's an optional field, is not necessary to set a date, if 0 there's no period limit to apply the rule.Example: Apply the modification (increment, discount or fixed price) from 2016-10-20 until 2016-10-30Example: Apply the modification (increment, discount or fixed price) from 2016-10-20.Example: Apply the modification (increment, discount or fixed price) until 2016-10-30. ★ ¡New! ★ -> Threshold prices to apply the rulesApply the change in your prices only for the product which price is between a threshold.Example: Apply the modification (increment, discount or fixed price) in the price of products which cost is more than 10€ and less than 30€.Example: Apply the modification (increment, discount or fixed price) in the price of products which cost is more than 50€.Example: Apply the modification (increment, discount or fixed price) in the price of products which cost is less than 100€. ★ ¡New! ★ -> Minimum and maximum result priceNow, you can set a minimum and a maximum price to get if the result of the increment or discount is below or above this prices.Example: Minimum result price = 100 and Maximum result price 200If the result price after the rule application is below 100€ (89€ for example), the product price will be 100€. If the result price after the rule application is above 200€ (205€ for example) the product price will be 200€.Example: Minimum result price = 100 and Maximum result price 0If the result price after the rule application is below 100€ (89€ for example), the product price will be 100€. If the result price after the rule application is 105€ the product price will be 105€.Example: Minimum result price = 0 and Maximum result price 100If the result price after the rule application is above 100€ (105€ for example) the product price will be 100€. If the result price after the rule application is 80€ the product price will be 80€. ★ ¡New! ★ -> Category tree to select the categoriesNew friendly interface in the Categories selector. Now, the display is in a category tree to select the categories easily. ★ ¡New! ★ -> Friendly multiple selectors interfaceNew friendly multiple selector interface with add and remove buttons and a search box. Geolocation compatibilityFull compatibility with Prestashop Geolocation to change the prices by Zone and Country. If the customer is not logged and the Prestashop Geolocation is enabled, the prices will be shown by the geolocation IP Country of the customer.If logged, the country and the zone calculation is done from the address delivery. Apply a markup or offer a discount in your productsFeel free to play with a markup in the price of your products creating an increment or a reduction configuration by category, by product, by customer group, by customer, by country, by zone, by supplier and by manufacturer. Example: You can create a new category, associate the products to this category and with our module you could set all this category products to 20$ without changing the original product price and without creating complicated discount rules to obtain the desired price. No multistore needed for the same catalog productsThe customers group filter allows to avoid creating a multistore for a B2B and B2C store, sharing the same catalog products but with different prices in each. module.name: lgcookieslaw
module.displayName: EU Cookie Law (Notification Banner + Cookie Blocker)
module.description: The only module that allows you to fully comply with the EU cookie law. Display a responsive and custom warning banner and disable cookies when users enter your website until you obtain their consent
module.author: Línea Gráfica
module.description_full: The only module that allows you to fully comply with the EU cookie law. Display a responsive and custom warning banner and disable cookies when users enter your website until you obtain their consent.
module.additional_description: Our module fully complies with the European Cookie Law. Complete compliance with the law Besides displaying a warning banner, our module is the only one that allows you to block the cookies when users enter your store. As established by the law, you "shall ensure that the storing of information, or the gaining of access to information already stored, in the terminal equipment of a subscriber or user is only allowed on condition that the subscriber or user concerned has given his or her consent, having been provided with clear and comprehensive information." Please note that all the other cookie modules sold on Addons only allows you to display a warning banner regardless of the user consent. Cookies are installed on the users' computer without obtaining their consent and regardless of their will. Main features of the modulesDisplay a warning banner on every page to inform users about the use of cookies and ask for their consentDisable a list of modules when users enter the website because warning users about cookies is useless and illegal if you have already installed cookies on their computer.Enable these cookies after having obtained their consent or maintain them disabled if they refuse.Fully customize the warning banner (color, text, link, font, position, multilingual mode, transparency, buttons...) Getting the user consent The module includes 2 different ways to ask user consent, you can choose between:Acceptance through a button: Users must click on the "I accept" button in the warning banner to give his consent. As soon as users give their consent, the warning banner disappears and all the modules using cookies will get enabled and will work as usual. But if users refuse to give their consent, the disabled modules will remain disabled. We recommend you to use this mode, this one allows you to fully comply with the law.Acceptance through the navigation: If users continue browsing the website, they will accept the use of cookies. The warning banner is displayed on the first page on which users arrive with a message like « By continuing browsing the website, you accept the use of cookies ». As soon as users decide to go to another page, the banner automatically disappears and the disabled modules will get enabled.Note: the consent remains valid during the period of time set in the module interface (we recommend you not to go over 13 months) Customizing the banner content and design As recommended by the European authority, the module allows you to customize the warning message inside the banner (to inform users about the cookies users and their purpose) and add a "More information" button into the banner that take users to a CMS page of your store (to explain in details the use of cookies on your store). The warning banner is responsive and will always be displayed full-width. The module comes with a Wysiwyg editor that allows you to fully customize the content of the banner (font, color, effects, html code, links...). You can also choose from the configuration page the background color of the banner, its percentage of opacity (transparency) and its position (top or bottom of the page). Moreover, the module is multilingual and automatically detects all the languages of your store, which allows you to set a different warning message per language. Note: the module is designed to not display a warning message when search engines robots crawl you store in order not to affect your SEO. Disabling the modules that use cookies This is the only module that allows you to choose the modules/cookies that you want to disable until users give their consent. This feature is compulsory because it is useless and illegal to inform users if you have already installed cookies on their computer with their consent. "Member States shall ensure that the storing of information, or the gaining of access to information already stored, in the terminal equipment of a subscriber or user is only allowed on condition that the subscriber or user concerned has given his or her consent, having been provided with clear and comprehensive information, in accordance with Directive 95/46/EC” EU Cookie Law To comply with the directive of the EU Cookie Law, we recommend you to disable the tracking (Google Analytics), social sharing (Facebook " Like ", Google " +1 ", etc.) and targeted advertising modules. Please note that all modules that are required for the good running of your PrestaShop store (ex: basket cookie, session cookie...) don't require any consents. Multistore mode The module is compatible with multistore and allows you to display the same notification banner on each one of your shop but the consent is the same for all shops. If you accept the use of cookies on one of your shop, the module will consider that you accept the use of cookies for all your other shops (mention it on your cookie policy) and the notification banner will not be shown when you go to your other shops.

module.name: bridgeconnector
module.description: Bridge Connector allows you to connect Store Manager application to PrestaShop Cloud and perform advanced data update and input (import, export, mass edit, etc)
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Bridge Connector allows you to connect Store Manager application to PrestaShop Cloud and perform advanced data update and input (import, export, mass edit, etc). Should be used with Store Manager desktop application
module.additional_description: Merchants will get access to their PrestaShop Cloud database with the help of Store Manager and perform the following operations: - Work with categories and products on a single page - no reload required; - Change prices of multiple products at the same time (perfect for sales!); - Create product features and combinations in bulk; - Upload multiple images simultaneously (drag and drop directly onto the browser); - Quickly update your inventory, manage stock levels, warehouses, and stock movements; - Import products (including virtual), specific prices, multi-features, attribute values, customized fields, and combinations; - Import products from csv, txt, xml, xls/xslx (Excel), ods (OpenOffice). No file requirements - all missing data can be applied on the fly; - Import customers with passwords exported from another PrestaShop installation (requires additional assistance); - Create orders with a POS and process them in bulk (e.g. change status for multiple orders at once); - Use store diagnostics to fix missing or broken images; - Take advantage of powerful reporting features; - Manage multiple PrestaShop installations and shops with one back-office; - Work offline - all changes will be applied when you reconnect.

module.additional_description: The storeowner has total control over the requested information in the registration form. CPF and CNPJ  can be configured as obligatory fields. module.author: Community developer
module.description_full: PrestAfip module offers an integration with the systems of the AFIP (Argentina), which allows you to generate bills online purchases made by customers in your shop.
module.additional_description: Today it is absolutely necessary to comply with the rules of electronic invoicing for certain taxpayers, and our module, allows you to generate fully valid for the AFIP bills. From the module, you will configure the entire environment (tax information, passwords, etc.) and should only generate electronic invoices from the Orders section Prestashop. The module installed everything necessary to collect tax information from customers (either in the registry or from the back office), and each client can view your bills from your account or receive them by email. Unlike other systems, you do not pay any monthly fee, and you can generate all the bills you want. Also, with the power offered by PrestaShop, you can generate invoices and customer orders created from the back office. Added option to filter invoices by period

module.name: linio
module.description: Already have your Prestashop shop but do you want to sell your products also in Linio? Do you find tedious synchronize products in both shops? This module allows you to export your products automatica
module.author: Community developer
module.description_full: Already have your Prestashop shop but do you want to sell your products also in Linio? Do you find tedious synchronize products in both shops? This module allows you to export your products automatically to Linio in the country of your choice.
module.additional_description: Lets you export your products automatically to Linio in the country of your choice, including combinations, images, stocks and manufacturers. You only have to select which categories you want to export the products. When you delete a product or combination, it will also be removed in Linio.It imports all orders generated in Linio with your products. So you can make your management in Prestashop and when you change an order status, will also change at Linio.It will record all errors generated during the above processes, including creating, updating and deleting products, combinations and images.The module does not guarantee that the products exported are not rejected by Linio for not meeting quality standards regarding data as the product description.

Преимущество Arvixe: Как бы Вы назвали сотрудничество, которое всегда остается взаимовыгодным, развивается вместе с Вашим бизнесом и поддерживает его на всех этапах развития? Arvixe зарекомендовал себя как универсальный и надежный партнер с 2003 года в индустрии хостинга для любого серьезного владельца сайта электронной коммерции. Ниже перечислены лишь некоторые из большого количества аргументов в пользу того, что Вам стоит выбрать Arvixe в качестве надежного хостинг партнера для PrestaShop:

module.name: loading
module.description: Loading is a consolidated, Spanish company dedicated to the domain and hosting business
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Loading is a consolidated, Spanish company dedicated to the domain and hosting business. Our employees are IT professionals and our purpose is that your e-commerce project is successful; for that purpose, we have one of the best technical support services available, with a real 24/7, 365 days support, and this is reflected by every satisfied client and the continued growth of our company.
module.additional_description: We work with the most technologically advanced, stable and reliable servers on the market, configured to obtain the best possible performance in every hosted resource/website. We have a wide variety of different hosting plans so every client can choose the one that suits best for their projects. Every Hosting plan is carefully optimized to give the best performance possible, allowing the client to activate cache systems like memcached, APC or OPCache. Our 1 click installer allows the client to have fast and easy access to a wide variety of popular applications, including the most popular e-commerce CMS: Prestashop. Prestashop is the most used tool by our clients as it allows them to create and implement their own online shop in an easy, fast and customizable way. The high performance that offers this kind of websites on our servers resides in the perfect optimization at both hardware and software configurations, even allowing the user to switch between different PHP versions to get the best performance in every Prestashop version, from the very early Prestashop versions up to the latest 1.6.1.0 stable version. OFFER You can begin to create your own Prestashop e-commerce with our hosting plan "Basic" for 3,90€/month, including a free domain for the first year. If you need a SSL certificate to protect your client's personal information, you can add a SSL SNI certificate to your hosting for 35€/year, or upgrade to the hosting plan "Argentum" (7,90€/month). In 3 clicks you'll have Prestashop installed and ready to customize and upload your own products, so you do not have to worry about anything else but taking your business to success. If you already have an online shop developed, we can migrate your website and/or guide you in the upload and configuration process so you can take advantage of all our optimizations. Discover our Prestashop optimized offer ready to setup, using the 1 Click Installer Are you using Prestashop 1.5 or 1.6? These version are available in our 1 click installer for a fast setup.

Кроме того, мы предоставляем полноценный образовательный канал, где можно найти доступные для всех справочные руководства и ресурсы по PrestaShop. Узнайте прямо сейчас, почему WebHostingHub является одним из лучших доступных решений по веб-хостингу. Мы подготовили специально для вас эксклюзивное предложение по PrestaShop.

module.name: stackscale
module.description: Stackscale is an Infrastructure as a Service (IaaS) provider offering Private Cloud services, in which the most important resources are of exclusive use by the customer and thus are highly protected a
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Stackscale is an Infrastructure as a Service (IaaS) provider offering Private Cloud services, in which the most important resources are of exclusive use by the customer and thus are highly protected against any activities performed by neighbouring customers, both in security and performance guarantee terms.
module.additional_description: Who is Stackscale for? Stackscale is targeted to medium and large consumers of computing, storage and network resources and all kind of IT integrators: Web/app hosters, eCommerce solution providers, managed services, social networks, BigData, VoIP, and virtually any IaaS, PaaS and SaaS provider, both private and public. Competitive pricing Virtualization enables the use of computing and storage equipment more efficiently and thus achieving economic savings, but these savings are normally kept by Public Cloud providers. At Stackscale we aim to bring all the advantages of the virtualization to the customer, giving full control over CPU oversubscription, storage thin provisioning and inline compression. That combined with reasonable financial margins allow us to offer highly competitive prices in the market. Most of our customers achieve savings from 40% to 80%. Is Stackscale interesting for me? To quickly determine if Stackscale is suitable for your project, let us review our minimum architecture: A single protected computing node featuring 128GB of RAM that leverages its 20Gbps network connection and average disk access latency below 1 ms to transfer the limiting resource to RAM size in most situations. The whole environment is redundant and fault-tolerant: network, storage and computing. This environment allows you to seamlessly deploy tens of virtual machines and have an indicative monthly price of 500 euros.

module.name: pqeasypost
module.displayName: Easy Post Pro (DHL, GLS, DPD, Colissimo, RoyalMail etc)
module.description: This module allows you to significaly increase the speed of your shipping process by integrating EasyPost
module.author: ProQuality
module.description_full: This module allows you to significaly increase the speed of your shipping process by integrating EasyPost.com API (Application Programming Interface) into PrestaShop and printing your shipping labels fast and easy. Only 3 cents per label!
module.additional_description: We all know that in order to run a successful business you have to optimize it and automatize it as much as possible, this module allows you to do that by increasing the shipping process by 70%. Think of how long it takes to receive an order from your customers, process the order by adding the products to the package, then connect to your shipping carrier`s software and manually insert the customer information, parcel information and delivery address for the order, for each order at a time. This is very time consuming and it`s very easy to make mistakes because you have a lot of data to process. With this module all of this is done automatically via the API (Application Programming Interface) that connects the orders section in prestashop with the carrier and instantly sends the information to the carrier, then prints the shipping label which is then slicked to the package. The module supports the most important carriers in the world.

module.name: popnewsletter
module.description: The most effective way to stay in touch with your customers! Pop Newsletter creates a popup inviting your visitors to sign up for your newsletter
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: The most effective way to stay in touch with your customers! Pop Newsletter creates a popup inviting your visitors to sign up for your newsletter. With this professional and completely customisable pop-up, you can attract new subscribers and retain them with a discount on their next purchase.
module.additional_description: Pop Newsletter allows you to show your visitors a pop-in when they arrive in your shop. Turn your visitors into subscribers!   Improve the subscription rate for your shop: Pop-ins are effective at attracting visitors’ attention, gaining more clicks than sliders, banners or sign-up panels in the footer (which have a conversion rate of only 0.05%). The proven results for this tool show increases of between 20% and 1,000% in your subscription rate.   Turn your subscribers into loyal customers: Offer them a discount voucher for their next purchase in your shop to thank them for subscribing.   Offer a flawless user experience: Similar to pop-ups but with an improved user experience, pop-ins integrate perfectly with the page where they appear. Pop Newsletter applies best practices recommended for this advertising method:Lightbox effectOption to close the module window with a simple click outside the pop-in, as well as a cross symbol button for closure in the top right-hand corner.Option to specify when the pop-in is activated. This allows your visitor to get to know your site before seeing the pop-in.Once your visitor closes the pop-in, it will not be shown again.Adaptable to all types of shop, with no need for programming or graphic design skills.    Improve results from your newsletters by increasing your contact base: Thanks to the optional newsletter sign-up form, you can analyse and classify your subscribers more effectively. Pop Newsletter also allows you to send a confirmation e-mail to the e-mail address provided by your subscriber to ensure there is no chance of your newsletter being sent to an incorrect address.

module.author: BM Services
module.description_full: Receive credit card payments from all over the world in your Prestashop online store with “Komerci 4 Prestashop By DJTAL”. This module integrates Komerci, the e-commerce payment solution of REDE.
module.additional_description: REDE is one of the biggest and more trusted Brazilian brands of credit card machines. Make payment available on your online shopping business for MasterCard®, Visa, Diners Club International and, as an exclusivity of Komerci, Hiper and Hipercard. Your clients can pay in 12 monthly installments with their credit card, and enjoy the checkout inside the Prestashop store. The “Komerci 4 Prestashop By DJTAL” grants full access and compatibility of your Prestashop store with Komerci, the e-commerce payment solution of REDE.Authorization with the withholding of captureReal-time approval of transactionsAvailability of payments in 12 monthly installments with credit cardCheckout with no site redirectionFull integration with the system and online store of PrestashopSecurityFraud risk tracking – Using our tool with Clearsale technology you can track all the transaction process and have warnings of all fraud risks as they happen.AVS (Confirmation of the client’s data on time) – Confirmation of the exactitude between the identification and address data in the visitor’s registration and in the credit card billing information.International SecureCode – Accept with the same security credit cards from all over the world.  Withholding Capture Gain time to analyze your sales. Reserve capture process until the cardholder billing time limit. You will have a 15 days deadline to analyze, authorize and deliver your product or service.   Lowest Cost Komerci is a payment gateway that dismisses third-party processors. This way you will not pay tuitions, only a tax over each sale.   Checkout inside Prestashop Your Prestashop cart will work normally, as you have set it for your e-commerce website, without website redirection.   Credit Cards Offer more payment options. With “Komerci 4 Prestashop By DJTAL” your client can pay with Hiper and Hipercard, besides MasterCard®, Visa and Diners Club International.

module.name: djtalrastreamento
module.description: With the “Brazilian Correios Tracking” module you and your client will have total agility and comfort to track the orders of your Prestashop online store in Brazil
module.author: BM Services
module.description_full: With the “Brazilian Correios Tracking” module you and your client will have total agility and comfort to track the orders of your Prestashop online store in Brazil. Save time for your customer service
module.additional_description: This product tracking module is so easy for your customer that he will not need you ever again to track his order. Quick list of open orders The module adds a window for tracking in all of the pages of the website and its location on each page is controlled by you the storeowner. Logged-in clients on your online store will see the Quick Tracking List. In it, they will have an automatic list with all of their open orders and their respective object codes. One click product tracking The listed object codes are direct links to the Correios table with the full tracking information for that order. No copy paste, only one click. This way to get to the tracking table is also available for the storeowner in Prestashop’s dashboard, in the normal session to manage orders. Less customer service, more satisfied customers Your customer service people can do way more than answer emails about where the client order is at the moment, each moment, every day until it arrives. With the “Brazilian Correios Tracking” module as soon as the client enters the site to make the question, he will see the Quick Tracking List with all of the open orders listed and the object codes ready to be clicked. Practicality As soon as the logged in client enters the site in any page, he/she will see the window listing all his open orders with the object codes as links to the tracking. Agility Client and storeowner access the Correios tracking table with only one click. Simplicity The integration with the dashboard of Prestashop is simple. The only chande is that the object codes in your normal list of open orders are now links. Tranquility More clients doing their own product tracking with ease means more satisfied shoppers and less workload for your customer service people. Now you can focus on what’s really important.

module.name: jet
module.description: Succeed your Jet
module.author: Common-Services
module.description_full: Succeed your Jet.com marketplace intergration and sell easily on the marketplace !
module.additional_description: With the Jet Marketplace for Prestashop module, your processing is automated, the products are exported directly to the Jet.com marketplace and your orders are automatically imported and integrated into your Prestashop store. You also automate communication with your customers: your order confirmations are sent directly to the customer by email via the Jet.com web service, customers are automatically notified and the status of your orders is automatically updated. By using the Jet Marketplace module, you maintain control of your offer and product flows, you automatically import your orders without additional cost or subscription and your data exchanges are automated and free. Integration is easy and convenient: you configure your module, your export becomes automatic and so you have no more data to manipulate Implementing scheduled tasks is simple and automated thanks to compatibility with the Prestashop Cron task-scheduling editor module (free). Just click on a button to automatically integrate your scheduled tasks in the module. It is still possible to manually configure your tasks. The module design is based on the online merchant experience. The module was conceived by an online merchant in the service of his colleagues and developed by professional developers, which gives it ease of use and maximum effectiveness. Your purchase is protected by free technical support which is assured unconditionally up to the moment of making the products available online and the import of your first orders. The module provides a simplified configuration, native scheduled tasks, intelligent mapping, sleek design and good ergonomics. This module was developed by Common-Services, which is a partner agency of Prestashop. Common-Services has been featuring on PrestaShop Addons since 2010 and it has also published more than 15 other best-selling modules that are marketed only on PrestaShop Addons. You must have contracted with Jet.com prior to purchasing this module.

module.additional_description: The module helps you shorten the time you spend with administration every day. Automatic invoice generation It simply sends all the data (customer data, shipping method, cart data) directly from PrestaShop to Számlázz.hu, which generates an invoice - accepted by NAV - and sends a PDF back to your shop. Downloadable PDF The PDF is available for you from the backoffice but it's also available for the customer who can download it from the 'Order history' section. You won't even have to print it for your customers and that is environmentally friendly. Invoice cancellation You can set up the module to create an invoice cancellation whenever an order has a particular order state (eg.: 'Canceled').

module.name: cdek
module.description: Интеграция магазина с службой доставки СДЕК. (CDEK) Добавляются новые способы доставки, которые расчитывают стоимость доставки через СДЕК. Очень удобный способ доставки ваших товаров
module.author: Community developer
module.description_full: Интеграция магазина с службой доставки СДЕК. (CDEK) Добавляются новые способы доставки, которые расчитывают стоимость доставки через СДЕК. Очень удобный способ доставки ваших товаров. Отличная альтернатива почте россии.
module.additional_description: Модуль интегрируется с личным кабинетом СДЕК. - в нём вы видите номера накладных, номер заказа в вашем магазине, статусы исполнения и т.д. - в магазине вы получаете накладную-квитанцию от СДЕК. Расчёт стоимости доставки в нужный регион. (расчёт делается через калькулятор СДЕК) - У товара обязательно должен быть вес и желательно размеры габаритов, так будет более точный расчёт. - У вас всегда будут актуальные данные по заказу. (в каком месте находится товар, получил ли его клиент, и т.д.) Вы можете настроить: - тарифы СДЕК которые хотите использовать. - статус заказа при котором отменится доставка в СДЕК. - индекс отправления (нужен для расчёта стоимости доставки)

module.additional_description: The selfAWB application allows AWB printing and FAN Courier shipments tracking; therefore, the client benefits from reduced take-over time, the possibility to view document confirmation from part of the recipient and receives information regarding intermediate status. The application in available onwww.selfAWB.ro.Confirmation of delivery by telephone, fax or tracking the delivery by AWB number, on www.fancourier.ro site.Payment on destination.Payments on behalf of the clients within the limit of 100 Euros.Multiple delivery attempts in case the recipient is not to be found at the specified address.Contacting recipient on phone in case of deliveries under special conditions.Two-week storage for wrong address shipments or shipments refused by recipient, in order to be redirected.Client Tracking service allows clients to check a customised page which contains information about shipments and confirmations of receipt.The possibility to receive shipments with direct payment into clients’ account from any branch of their company or from business partners.Issuance of bi-monthly invoice accompanied by an appendix containing details regarding shipments of the respective period.The selfAWB application: each client has the possibility to define their own database of frequent recipient-partners, either by individual configuration or importing their own database; clients benefit from reduced take-over time and have the possibility to view transport document confirmation.

module.additional_description: iLink-VoguePay allows you to accept both local and international payments directly into your Bank Account.Your customers can pay with any debit / credit cards or other payment methods used in Nigerian, Ghana or South Africa. Examples includes Visa, MasterCard, Verve, VoguePay wallet, E-tranzact or Pocketmoni.It is extremely easy to configure and it is compatible with Interswitch webpay.You can also view and query records of all payment transactions. This can be very helpful in tracking your sales and also following up on customers payment status.iLink-VoguePay can work on multiple stores if you're using the multistore feature.Secure, it protects you against man-in-the-middle attacks and other potential security threats.

module.name: valitor
module.categoryName: Оплата банковской картой или с помощью электронного кошелька
module.description: Our Valitor Web Payments module integrates your Prestashop store with the Valitor payment gateway
module.author: Community developer
module.description_full: Our Valitor Web Payments module integrates your Prestashop store with the Valitor payment gateway.
module.additional_description: Valitor is Visa's and Mastercard's partner in Iceland and an online and e-commerce payment solutions company that operates internationally, offering services to partners, merchants, banks, and cardholders around the world. Securely accept Credit Card payments from customers during the checkout process. The customer is redirected to the Valitor Payment Page to submit their payment, and is returned to your store to complete the transaction. The Valitor payment gateway notifies the payment module of transaction status using an IPN notification, which means an Order will be created even if the Customer accidentally closes their browser window. The Credit Card information is not collected or stored on your website, alleviating most PCI compliance issues

module.name: djtaljadlog
module.description: “Shipping calculation by JadLog” is fully configurable module that considers weight, transit and the storeowner’s rules for free shipping
module.author: Community developer
module.description_full: “Shipping calculation by JadLog” is fully configurable module that considers weight, transit and the storeowner’s rules for free shipping. We used JadLog technology and made the whole process integrated inside PrestaShop’s checkout and cart.
module.additional_description: Have full control over the calculation system displayed to your customer. The integration with PrestaShop’s cart and checkout is a clear and non intrusive one. Save time of your customer service people. • JadLog shipping modalities – Your client can choose between Express, .Package, Ground Service, Economic, DOC, Corporate, .COM, International, Cargo and Emergency to calculate his shipping rate. • Integrated calculation with PrestaShop 1.6 – The weight configured in the product details of PrestaShop’s dashboard is taken on account when calculating shipping. • Free Shipping Rules – The storeowner can optionally set a shipping range for the cart where the shipping becomes free of charge. • JadLog technology - You can trust that our results will match with JadLog rates and transit time. • Full configuration – The “Shipping calculation by JadLog” module was conceived to fulfill your configuration needs and be a true storeowner’s tool. • Less workload for the customer service people – The clients themselves do their shipping calculations.

Saves time while creating consignment.Map Payment Options to Delhivery Payment Modes like COD / Pre-Paid. Easy installation

module.author: Silbersaiten

With our module, the shop owners from Germany and Austria can now quickly and simply connect an additional distribution channel. Rakuten offers a large network of over 7000 dealers, a market with more than 22 million products and better terms than the market leader Amazon.
